str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To expect eagerly, wait for eagerly, look for. From apo and ekdechomai; to expect fully.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
